http://www.xulplanet.com/tutorials/xultu/xblmethods.html http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_xblbody.html The content of the body element should be the code to execute when the method is called.
A unique identifier so that you can identify the body with. You can use this as a parameter to getElementById and other DOM functions and to reference the element in style sheets.
